game.name: Grounded 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Shrunk again, but the world is much larger. In this open-world, single-player or co-op survival adventure, craft weapons and armor, build your base, and traverse the playground on your buggy. But something else is out there—and it hasn’t forgotten you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shrunk again, but the world is much larger. In this open-world, single-player or co-op survival adventure, craft weapons and armor, build your base, and traverse the playground on your buggy. But something else is out there—and it hasn’t forgotten you.
